CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Workers Compensation Type] DOES NOT EQUAL SR NO WC COI or blank AND [Workers Compensation Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [WC Loaded Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Workers Compensation Type] DOES NOT EQUAL SR NO WC COI or blank AND [Workers Compensation Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [WC Loaded Target Time]
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c , 'SR NO WC COI')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c , ''))&& ISBLANK(Workers_Compensation_Loaded__c) &&(NOW() <= WC_Loaded_Target_Time__c ), "Inside SLA", IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c , 'SR NO WC COI')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c , ''))&& ISBLANK(Workers_Compensation_Loaded__c) && (NOW() > WC_Loaded_Target_Time__c), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: WC Loaded (P) SLA
